mapper.sql: C_UID, C_GID, C_ADMIN, C_USERNAME, C_PASSWORD, C_SCORE, C_LAST_LOGIN, C_MAIL_BOX, C_IS_DELETE
mapper.select:
select
from TB_USER where C_USERNAME=#{username} and C_PASSWORD=#{password}
mapper.insert:
insert into TB_USER
C_UID,
C_GID,
C_ADMIN,
C_USERNAME,
C_PASSWORD,
C_SCORE,
C_LAST_LOGIN,
C_MAIL_BOX,
C_IS_DELETE,
#{cUid,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{cGid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{cAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{cUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update TB_USER
C_GID = #{cGid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
C_ADMIN = #{cAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT},
C_USERNAME = #{cUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_PASSWORD = #{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_SCORE = #{cScore,jdbcType=BIGINT},
C_LAST_LOGIN = #{cLastLogin,jdbcType=DATE},
C_MAIL_BOX = #{cMailBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
C_IS_DELETE = #{cIsDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where C_UID = #{cUid,jdbcType=TINYINT}

update TB_USER set C_GID = #{cGid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, C_ADMIN = #{cAdmin,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_USERNAME = #{cUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_PASSWORD = #{cPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_SCORE = #{cScore,jdbcType=BIGINT}, C_LAST_LOGIN = #{cLastLogin,jdbcType=DATE}, C_MAIL_BOX = #{cMailBox,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_IS_DELETE = #{cIsDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT} where C_UID = #{cUid,jdbcType=TINYINT}
